member.summary: Gets or sets a data contract surrogate provider that can be used to modify the code generated during an import operation.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.ImportOptions.EnableDataBinding
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether types in generated code should implement the interface.
member.returns: if the generated code should implement the interface; otherwise, . The default is .

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.ImportOptions.GenerateInternal
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether generated code will be marked internal or public.
member.returns: if the code will be marked ; otherwise, . The default is .

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.ImportOptions.GenerateSerializable
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether generated data contract classes will be marked with the attribute in addition to the attribute.
member.returns: to generate classes with the applied; otherwise, . The default is .

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.ImportOptions.ImportXmlType
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether all XML schema types, even those that do not conform to a data contract schema, will be imported.
member.returns: to import all schema types; otherwise, . The default is .

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.ImportOptions.Namespaces
member.summary: Gets a dictionary that contains the mapping of data contract namespaces to the CLR namespaces that must be used to generate code during an import operation.
member.returns: A that contains the namespace mappings.

member.summary: Gets a collection of types that represents data contract collections that should be referenced when generating code for collections, such as lists or dictionaries of items.
member.returns: An that contains the referenced collection types.
